install.name: Smartsef plugin - Contact

install.description: Smartsef plugin for the contact SEF urls

param.name: url_prefix_path
param.label: URL prefix path
param.description: A URL prefix path for the contact link, leave empty if you don't want to use a prefix path (for example /contact)
